decks.notes: This deck focuses on aggressive creatures and disruption spells to quickly overwhelm opponents. Sorin, Imperious Bloodlord helps to bring out powerful creatures like Bloodtithe Harvester and Archfiend of the Dross, while Preacher of the Schism can generate additional value. The deck also includes strong removal spells like Fatal Push and disruptive spells like Thoughtseize and Duress to control the game. With a mix of efficient creatures, disruption, and ways to pump out extra damage, this Rakdos Aggro deck aims to close out games quickly and decisively.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly cast Arclight Phoenix by filling up the graveyard with instants and sorceries using cards like Lightning Axe, Treasure Cruise, and Fiery Impulse. Key cards like Ledger Shredder and Opt help dig for important pieces while also enabling the Phoenix's recursion ability. Picklock Prankster disrupts the opponent while profit's Eidetic Memory provides card advantage. The deck also includes some control elements like Spell Pierce and tempo plays like Brazen Borrower to maintain board presence. Overall, the strategy revolves around aggressive plays and leveraging the Phoenix's ability to return from the graveyard.

The deck focuses on assembling a powerful combo utilizing Amalia Benavides Aguirre and various support cards to generate a large amount of life gain and creature tokens. The strategy involves searching for key pieces with cards like Chord of Calling and Collected Company, while also utilizing cards like Razorverge Thicket and Temple Garden to fix mana. Return to the Ranks and Aetherflux Reservoir are used as win conditions once the combo is fully active, with cards like Fauna Shaman and Selfless Savior providing additional support and protection for the combo pieces.

The deck focuses on ramping up mana quickly with cards like Elvish Mystic and Nykthos, Shrine to Nyx to cast powerful green cards like Old-Growth Troll and Cavalier of Thorns. It also utilizes cards like Kiora, Behemoth Beckoner and Nissa, Who Shakes the World to generate additional mana and card advantage. The deck's win condition revolves around creating a strong board presence with creatures and using Leyline of the Guildpact and Boseiju, Who Endures to protect and enhance its creatures, ultimately overwhelming opponents with a devotion to green strategy.

This deck focuses on quickly dealing damage to the opponent by utilizing efficient burn spells and aggressive creatures. It aims to empty the opponent's life total as fast as possible, often overwhelming them with a flurry of cheap, direct damage spells and impactful creatures. The deck's main strategy revolves around maintaining pressure on the opponent and finishing the game before they have a chance to stabilize. It capitalizes on its low mana curve to consistently apply pressure and close out games swiftly.
